item.title: Need help writing a code
item.dc:creator: @JCor9 JCor9
item.description:
@JCor9 wrote:

Ok im not sure if im aloud to ask this but i need help to writing a code for c.slayerLevel

public int getCombatLevel() { int mag = (int) ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[6])) * 1.5); int ran = (int) ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[4])) * 1.5); int attstr = (int) ((double) (getLevelForXP(playerXP[0])) + (double) (getLevelForXP(playerXP[2]))); if (ran > attstr) { combatLevel = (int) (((getLevelForXP(playerXP[1])) * 0.25) + ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[3])) * 0.25) + ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[5])) * 0.125) + ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[4])) * 0.4875) + ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[22])) * 0.121212)); } else if (mag > attstr) { combatLevel = (int) (((getLevelForXP(playerXP[1])) * 0.25) + ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[3])) * 0.25) + ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[5])) * 0.125) + ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[6])) * 0.4875) + ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[22])) * 0.121212)); } else { combatLevel = (int) (((getLevelForXP(playerXP[1])) * 0.25) + ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[3])) * 0.25) + ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[5])) * 0.125) + ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[0])) * 0.325) + ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[2])) * 0.325) + ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[22])) * 0.121212)); } return combatLevel; }

how do i make c.slayerLevel like this code?? pleave help
